content: प्रतीप {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [प्रतिगताः आपो यत्र, प्रतिअप् अच्, अप ईप् च्] {@--1@} Contrary, unfavourable, adverse, opposite; तत्प्रतीपपवनादि वैकृतं <ls>R. 11. 62.</ls> {@--2@} Reverse, inverted, out of order. {@--3@} Backward, retrograde. {@--4@} Disagreeable, displeasing. {@--5@} Refractory, disobedient, obstinate, perverse; <ls>Pt. 1. 424.</ls> {@--6@} Turned away, averted. {@--7@} Meeting, encountering. {@--8@} Hindering. --पः <ab>N.</ab> of a king, father of Saṃtanu and grand-father of Bhīṣma. --पं <ab>N.</ab> of a figure of speech in which the usual form of comparison is inverted, the उपमान being compared with the उपमेय; प्रतीपमुपमानस्याप्युपमेयत्वकल्पनं . त्वल्लोचनसमं पद्मं त्वद्वक्त्रसदृशो विधुः .. <ls>Chandr. 5. 9</ls>; (for fuller definitions and explanation see <ls>K. P. 10</ls> under प्रतीप). --पं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} On the contrary. {@--2@} In an inverted order. {@--3@} Against, in opposition to; भर्तुर्विप्रकृतापि रोषणतया मा स्म प्रतीपं गमः <ls>Ś. 4. 17.</ls>
